document.full_text: fittingly for the launch of the new authorized james bond novel "carte blanche," there was a luxury car, champagne on tap, crack british troops abseiling from the rafters and a long-legged girl on a vintage motorbike.
document.title: james bond back in novel penned by american bestseller
lines_and_colors: fittingly for the launch of the new authorized james bond novel "carte blanche," there was a luxury car, champagne on tap, crack british troops abseiling from the rafters and a long-legged girl on a vintage motorbike.
